title.rendered: Top eCommerce Development Companies In India To Change Business Fortunes

content.rendered:
As per Statista, the eCommerce market is projected to grow by 10.06 % by 2028, reaching $4.991 trillion; entrepreneurs are navigating both opportunities and challenges. 

As the digital realm transforms from a trend to a necessity, the need for a robust eCommerce presence has never been more vital. Amidst the competitive crescendo, your eCommerce website is the virtual face of your business. The challenge lies in embracing this necessity and ensuring that your online platform stands out.

Why India?

In the quest for excellence, outsourcing software development to India emerges as a strategic move, offering a solution to the pain points heightened by the pandemic. India, a hub of innovation and expertise in eCommerce development, has become the go-to destination for entrepreneurs seeking optimal returns in the online industry.

However, this journey has its challenges. The online sphere is saturated, and choosing the right eCommerce development company can be akin to navigating a labyrinth. Amidst many options, finding a top-notch eCommerce website development company in India can pose a formidable challenge.

Setting the Stage: Choosing the Best

With plenty of choices, this blog unravels the intricacies, offering insights to empower entrepreneurs to make informed decisions.

You will embark on a journey where your eCommerce dreams translate into reality. Let us explore the landscape together, unveiling the best eCommerce development company in India that aligns seamlessly with your aspirations. The blog is not just a guide but your compass in the vast sea of eCommerce possibilities.

Based on these pointers below, we have compiled a list of top eCommerce Companies. 

1) Years of experience & expertise

2) Projects completed

3) Clutch ratings

4) No. of employees

5) Avg. hourly rates

6) Satisfied services

Revolutionize your eCommerce strategy.

Embrace success with top Indian developers.

Contact Us

Top eCommerce Development Companies in India

Based on our research, some of the top contenders as top eCommerce development companies are mentioned below.

1. PixelCrayons

PixelCrayons is one of India’s popular eCommerce web development companies with an excellent track record. The innovative software solution provides services to start-ups and large-scale industries. Because of the meticulous approach, it primarily works in eCommerce development.

Furthermore, the main USP is always maintaining performance and on-time project delivery. It has such a fantastic client retention record. 

  • Website: www.pixelcrayons.com  
  • Employees: 201-500  
  • Hourly rate:  $25 per hour 
  • Established: 2004
  • Clutch Rating: 4.9/5
  • Specialized Services: Software development services, eCommerce Services, Mobile app development

2. ValueCoders

ValueCoders is also one of the fastest-growing offshore development companies and has been renowned as the best eCommerce development company for ten years.

With innovative & in-depth software solutions, their services are widespread, i.e., start-ups to large-scale industries. It gained accolades for better delivery and on-time project maintenance. In terms of client retention, they compete with the best in the business. Moreover, you save up to 60% of your estimated budget.

  • Website: www.valuecoders.com
  • Employees: 700+  
  • Hourly rate: Up to $25 per hour 
  • Established: 2004
  • Clutch Rating: 5/5
  • Specialized Services: eCommerce development, Software development services, Mobile app development

3. WPWeb Infotech

WPWeb Infotech is one of the best eCommerce development service providers, founded in 2015. With over 7+ years of experience, this company has established itself as a trusted partner for businesses seeking robust and innovative eCommerce solutions. Their impressive portfolio includes more than 250+ completed projects, showcasing their ability to deliver high-quality results that meet diverse client needs.

Whether you are a small startup or a large enterprise, WPWeb Infotech’s expertise and commitment to customer satisfaction make them a top choice for your eCommerce development needs.

Website: www.wpwebinfotech.com
Employees: 50 – 200
Hourly rate: $25 / hr
Established: 2015
Clutch Rating: 5/5
Specialized Services: eCommerce development, WordPress development , Web Development, CMS Development, IT Outsourcing, IT Staff Augmentation.

4. Infinijith Apps & Technologies

A full-stack development company based in Coimbatore with top-notch technology and agile software methodology for the software development process. 

The company works with a primary objective of customer satisfaction within the budget. Services that make it popular: eCommerce, healthcare, travel, education, etc.

Moreover, it has gained accolades for developing secure eCommerce development to drive top-tier business.

  • Website: www.infinijith.com
  • Employees: 11-50
  • Hourly rate: $15 to $ 25 per hour 
  • Established: 2014
  • Clutch Ratings: 5/5
  • Specialized Services: Full Stack Development, Mobile App Development, eCommerce Development, Software Testing Services, UI/UX Design, and more.

Also Read: Key Factors To Consider For Measuring E-Commerce Success

5. SemiDot Infotech

SemiDot Infotech is the leading eCommerce website development company. They have always worked focusing on clients’ requirements & assisting them with top-class solutions. SemiDot Infotech offers a variety of custom eCommerce websites & mobile app development services while focusing on building trust & keeping transparency with their clients.

  • Website: https://semidotinfotech.com/
  • Employees: 100-120
  • Hourly rate: $25-$30 Per Hour
  • Established: 2010
  • Clutch Rating: 4.9/5
  • Specialized Services: Web Development, eCommerce Development, Web Design, CMS Development, Open Source Development, QA Testing Services, Digital Marketing,

Transform your online business.

Leverage expertise from India's best eCommerce developers..

Contact Us

How does an eCommerce development company work?

It delivers and develops a quality platform by typically assessing critical parameters:

♦ Client Brief: The first ladder starts with discovery & research. The company collects reviews on future projects, goals, and purpose and agrees upon features & solutions.

♦ Planning: In the second stage, the creation process further induces an action plan, and the sitemap includes customer wishes. That’s why a sitemap is critical in linking different strategies to decide project needs.

♦ Design: The development process includes creating all visual parts of the future website. After the design stage, the customer will confirm or amend. At this stage, the team edit text, write headlines, site description & preliminary product information. As a result, the process should be approved before the coding.

♦ Coding and Development: The work done previously will be used to program an actual web store, marketplace, or different eCommerce website via frameworks, CMS, coding platforms, and search engine optimization tools.

♦ Testing and Launch: Once the eCommerce product is ready, the team performs quality assurance before publishing a site.

♦ Maintenance: Launching the site is not only a priority. A few websites require maintenance through constant checks, support, and regular updates.

Also read: Top E-Commerce Developer In India

Top eCommerce development companies In India: A Key To Your Digital Assets

Developing a website from the beginning is critical. Things like the load time interface of the website are nearly essential to keep you hooked up to services. However, it all depends on the complexity of client requests, the scope of work, the platform, future websites, proposals, etc. 

It makes an eCommerce web design company work as a great partner if you are relatively new to entrepreneurship.

A well-established company delivers a typical website in less than a preliminary four months. They create a platform that usually inputs design ideas about the shopping cart, images, price calculator, templates, user registration/login, and purchase cycle. 

Furthermore, the UI teams specialize in brand recognition to ensure quality website content across all digital platforms.

  • Payment Integration: eCommerce development companies enable your website with payment gateway integration, i.e., PayPal – the most viable payment method for top eCommerce companies with more than 254 million users, or Google Pay with 25 million monthly active subscribers. Apple Pay has over 39  million users. It implies the importance of a payment gateway in an eCommerce website.
  • SEO & Marketing:  eCommerce developers improve visibility, sales & traffic boost. You attract visitors and potential buyers with quality SEO, increasing hot leads into conversions. At the same time, it helps brand recognition graphics and excites customers to purchase.
  • Technical Ongoing Support:  It is critical as post-launch, regular updates, bug fixing, troubleshooting, further enhancements, etc., that an expert eCommerce development company can deliver all things in a bundle.

Transform Your Brand with ValueCoders' Excellence!

Ready to redefine your eCommerce fortunes? Unlock a world full of possibilities.

Explore Services Now

How can you choose the best eCommerce development companies In India?

Before you go and take a step further, choosing the most suitable eCommerce development checking priorities is essential.

How experienced are your team and employees?

An eCommerce development company deploys multi-taskers possessing the necessary skills to create your project. The team should have expertise in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, PHP & Ruby languages. 

Equipped with skills in website design, front-end and back-end development, data analysis, and search engine optimization will be an extra advantage.

How much is the charge for dedicated service? How much does it cost to hire?

Various parameters determine the quality, quantity, and result. Depending on the complexity and specifications of the project, the price ranges from $400 to $1,000. 

Some companies offer calculators on their websites, where you can calculate the approximate price of the final product and decide if that suits your budget. 

Final Words

In your quest for eCommerce supremacy, ValueCoders brings you a curated list of top-tier eCommerce development companies, transforming mere aspirations into a thriving reality. 

As you explore the world of possibilities, consider the prowess of Infinijith Apps & Technologies, ValueCoders, and PixelCrayons – pioneers in shaping digital destinies.

Standing at the crossroads of choices, let ValueCoders be your compass. Choose excellence, innovation, and ValueCoders — the catalyst for your eCommerce triumph. 

Contact us to embark on a transformative journey where your business fortunes change with every strategic decision. Success awaits — let’s code your eCommerce triumph together!
